article.title: Lescher Nominated for Appointment to Office of the Chief of Naval Operations

tags.tag: Office of the Chief of Naval Operations

article.text: Rear Adm. William K. Lescher, USN, has been nominated for appointment to the rank of vice admiral and assigned as deputy chief of naval operations for Integration of Capabilities and Resources, N-8, Office of the Chief of Naval Operations, Pentagon, Washington, D.C.
